meanings.definition: A type of waterbus in Venice.
meanings.sent1: The vaporetti carried tourists along the canals.
meanings.sent2: We took the vaporetti to explore the beautiful city.
meanings.sent3: The vaporetti drivers sometimes tell funny stories to passengers.
meanings.sent4: The vaporetti glided through the water like graceful swans.
meanings.sent5: The colorful vaporetti added a vibrant touch to the serene Venetian waters.

meanings.sent1: Many vaporetti lined up at the dock ready to transport people.
meanings.sent2: The vaporetti were a common sight in the busy waterways of Venice.
meanings.sent3: The vaporetti in the fleet had quirky names painted on their sides.
meanings.sent4: The swarm of vaporetti created a buzzing atmosphere in the canal.
meanings.sent5: The sound of vaporetti engines hummed softly in the background of the city.
